entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
